messages.subject: Re: Introduction from Minnesota
messages.msgSnippet: Yes the long OOOOO sound! Although, I grew up in Wisconsin so I don t have quite as much drawl. :) Laura ... Sick sense of humor? Visit Yahoo! TV s Comedy with
messages.messageBody:
Yes the long OOOOO sound! Although, I grew up in Wisconsin so I don't have quite as much drawl. :)

Laura


---------------------------------
Sick sense of humor? Visit Yahoo! TV's Comedy with an Edge to see what's on, when.

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Introduction from Minnesota
messages.msgSnippet: ***I believe it d be Minnesotans , said with a very hard long o sound! :) (even though I m a South Dakotan) but I believe that s correcto, eh, Kelli?*** Yep
messages.messageBody:
***I believe it'd be 'Minnesotans', said with a very hard long o sound! :)
(even though I'm a South Dakotan) but I believe that's correcto, eh, Kelli?***



Yep :) Minnesoootans ;) hehe

Welcome! And if you want to join the MN unschooling list feel free :) It isn't very busy but it is there.

Here is the link : http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingmn/

And we are planning to meet up at the Minnesota Homeschooling Conference in New Brighton (near the cities) Sept 29 :) Sandra Dodd is coming up to speak. Yay!





Kelli~


http://ourjoyfullife.blogspot.com/

"Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage." ~Anais Nin




---------------------------------
Ready for the edge of your seat? Check out tonight's top picks on Yahoo! TV.

messages.msgSnippet: I believe it d be Minnesotans , said with a very hard long o sound! :) (even though I m a South Dakotan) but I believe that s correcto, eh, Kelli? Welcome,
messages.messageBody:
I believe it'd be 'Minnesotans', said with a very hard long o sound! :)
(even though I'm a South Dakotan) but I believe that's correcto, eh, Kelli?

Welcome, Laura, Mark, Brynn and Maya!

Karen
in Rapid City, SD

peace."
Jimi Hendrix

messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "lkoz2" <lkoz2@...> wrote:
>
> Hi~
>
> Just wanted to say hi, and looking forward to being a part of this
> list. We live in St. Paul Mn, my husband Mark, and 2 daughters Brynn
> 4 and Maya 14mo. We are really interested in learning all about
> Unschooling. I am a Holt fan, and am always finding new insight on
> Sandra Dodd's web site.
>
> Laura
>


Welcome Laura! There are some other Minnesotians (is that what you're
all called?) here on the list.:)

Ren
learninginfreedom.com

messages.subject: Introduction from Minnesota
messages.msgSnippet: Hi~ Just wanted to say hi, and looking forward to being a part of this list.  We live in St. Paul Mn, my husband Mark, and 2 daughters Brynn 4 and Maya 14mo.
messages.messageBody:
Hi~

Just wanted to say hi, and looking forward to being a part of this
list. We live in St. Paul Mn, my husband Mark, and 2 daughters Brynn
4 and Maya 14mo. We are really interested in learning all about
Unschooling. I am a Holt fan, and am always finding new insight on
Sandra Dodd's web site.

Laura
